title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated with an outstanding 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes and an excellent 87 Metacritic score. It's created by Vince Gilligan (Breaking Bad) and stars popular actress Rhea Seehorn on Apple TV+.

title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf
overview: Before The Terminal List, Navy SEAL Ben Edwards finds himself entangled in the black operations side of the CIA. The deeper Ben goes into the 'gray', the harder it will become to not give himself over to his darker impulses. Every man has two wolves inside him – light and dark – fighting for control. Which wolf will Ben Edwards feed?
reason: A highly anticipated Prime Video prequel to the popular 'The Terminal List,' starring fan-favorite Taylor Kitsch. It has a solid 7.6 IMDb rating from over 20,000 votes and a decent 66 Metacritic score.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes and a 77 Metacritic score. This HBO series features A-list actor Mark Ruffalo and is created by Brad Ingelsby, known for 'Mare of Easttown'.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: This Netflix crime drama features A-list actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law, with Bateman also serving as a producer. It holds a strong 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35,000 votes, indicating significant viewer interest.
